## Releases

* **CMSSW_7_2_0_pre2** has been release 1 week ago
    * Pull Requests in github:
        * [4530](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/4530) - rovere - <font class="red bold">Initial version of a slimmed and simple vertex validator.</font>
        * [4455](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/4455) - Juan - <font class="red bold">TrackBase & HitPattern redesign discussed on the RECO meeting of 08/05/2014</font>
            * Additional material [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/327055/contribution/6/material/slides/0.pdf)
        * [4614](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/4614) - VinInn - <font class="red bold">added persistent position to GS hits</font>
        * [4563](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/4563) - VinInn - <font class="red bold">Fix det-pointer in tracker-rechit used in GlobalTrajectoryBuilderBase</font>
        * [4447](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/4447) - VinInn - <font class="red bold">KfComponentsHolder cleanup</font>
        * [4435](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/4435) - VinInn - <font class="red bold">speed up DA clusterizer allowing more vectorization</font>
        * [4205](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/4205) - ebrondol - <font class="red bold">Deterministic Annealing Filter for track reconstruction</font>
        * [4437](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/4437) - VinInn - <font class="red bold">Speed up conversions</font>
        * [4438](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/4438) - VinInn - <font class="red bold">Speed up GSF</font>
* The tentative and regularly updated release schedule for 72X (which is the release for 2014 data taking) can be found [here](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/CMSSW_7_2_0)

## Announcements

* We are planning to replicate the successfull Tracking Training Day that was help last year
* The <font class="red bold">tentative</font> date is October 20th:
    * sign this date on your agenda!!
* For Conference Reports and Proceeding, please keep in mind that:
    * if you submit to Subeditor of project<font class="red bold">Physics</font> with a subdetector of <font class="red bold">Tracker</font>, the proceeding will arrive to Tracking POGs for review
    * if you submit to Subeditor of project<font class="red bold">Tracker</font> with <font class="red bold">any</font> subdetector, the proceeding will arrive to the Tracker editors
    * <font class="red bold">Please, select the proper option to avoid that your proceeding will remain un-handled</font>
